site_name: EARL'S COURT 2 EXHIBITION, CENTRE, LILLIE BRIDGE RAIL DEPOT, WEST KENSINGTON AND GIBBS GREEN HOUSING ESTATES AND ADJOINING LAND, LONDON
description: This Council is asked for its observations on an application submitted to the London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham for: Use of the former Earls Court Exhibition Centre 2 site for a period from 1 July to 10 October 2021, for the temporary erection (including installation and de-installation) of two main event structures - a big top tent and theatre, a box office, food and drink units, amusement rides, a beach area, toilets, storage, outdoor seating areas and fencing, in conjunction with Underbelly 'London Wonderground Event 2021' (associated Advertisement Consent Application ref: 2021/01444/ADV).
